About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

I was born on November 12 2002, 12.11.02. I completed my primary and secondary education at Aramyan Uncuyan School, and I attended high school at Özel Surp Haç Armenian High School. Currently, I am studying at Istanbul Gelişim University as a second-year student in Computer Technology. I am doing my internship at Kalmera Net Software company. Along with the courses I've taken on Udemy,I'm currently takeing the Harvard University x CS50 computer science course ,I am developing myself in the field of frontend.
